channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New open source AI company Deep Cogito releases first models and they’re already topping the charts
item.description: The initial model lineup includes five base sizes: 3 billion, 8 billion, 14 billion, 32 billion, and 70 billion parameters.

item.title: DeepSeek unveils new technique for smarter, scalable AI reward models
item.description: Reward models holding back AI? DeepSeek's SPCT creates self-guiding critiques, promising more scalable intelligence for enterprise LLMs.

item.title: Nvidia’s new Llama-3.1 Nemotron Ultra outperforms DeepSeek R1 at half the size
item.description: Compared to DeepSeek R1, Llama-3.1-Nemotron-Ultra-253B shows competitive results despite having less than half the parameters.
